Hamas' Arouri was a key player until death in sudden Beirut strikeDeputy Hamas leader Saleh al-Arouri had long expected the Israeli drone strike that security sources said killed him in Beirut on Tuesday, three months after his group's surprise cross-border assault that triggered a devastating war in Gaza. Tue, 02 Jan 2024 19:21:13 GMT云恩5UI73NL67AX5SVCZSHZGE4 https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/hamas-arouri-was-key-player-until-death-sudden-beirut-strike-2024-01-02/Nidal Al-Mughrabi世界中东
Ukrainian apartment dweller works hard to cope after Russian bombingInured by nearly two years of war, Olena Ohiievych wasted no time getting to work on Tuesday as she confronted the shambles left in her apartment by the latest Russian air attacks on Kyiv and its suburbs. Tue, 02 Jan 2024 18:29:38 GMT 2KT2RGL6YVIYFJCSWWX5JC76QM https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukrainian-apartment-dweller-works-hard-cope-after-Russian-bombing-2024-01-02/Yuri Kovalenko世界欧洲
Five Venezuelans freed out of 31 migrants kidnapped in MexicoMexican security services have freed five Venezuelans kidnapped over the weekend by gunmen, local authorities said on Tuesday, as they searched for another 26 people snatched from a bus traveling to the border city of Matamoros. Tue, 02 Jan 2024 18:25:26 GMT OSSGM42L65NDDGDYICEZOUKJEI https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/ Five-venezuelans-freed-out-31-migrants-kidnapped-mexico-2024-01-02/Reuters世界美洲
'It was a miracle': How passengers escaped a JAL fireball in TokyoThe flight between the northern city of Sapporo and Tokyo's Haneda airport is Japan's busiest air route, and one of the most frequent services anywhere in the world. Japan Airlines (JAL) operates 16 round-trip flights a day. Tue, 02 Jan 2024 17:50:36 GMT AIRQT6FAFVJGHJGICJFNZ2ZJEA https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/it-was-miracle-how-passengers-escaped-jal-fireball-tokyo-2024-01-02/Daniel Leussink, Yoshifumi Takemoto世界亚太地区
France to send forensic experts to Tokyo after airport collisionA team of forensic experts from planemaker Airbus and French state agency BAE will arrive in Japan on Wednesday to help authorities investigate the deadly accident involving a A350 plane at Tokyo's Haneda airport, they said on Tuesday. Tue, 02 Jan 2024 17:39:37 GMT 6EPFCVIKBBK7XP55GTEAREQGUE https://www.reuters.com/world/japan/france-send-forensic-experts-tokyo-after-airport-collision-2024-01-02/Reuters世界日本
Evacuation from burning JAL jet helped by passengers leaving bagsAll 379 people aboard a Japan Airlines airliner escaped after a collision with a Coast Guard aircraft at Tokyo's Haneda airport that killed five of six crew on the smaller aircraft on Tuesday. Displaced Gazans scavenge wood for makeshift shelters in tent cityFor the Maarouf family, living in Rafah's tent city after fleeing their house in Gaza at the start of Israel's deadly bombardment nearly three months ago, home is now the small campfire they sit around each night.
